Class Description
ApolloRuleDecorator  
ArtemisRuleDecorator  
AthenaRuleDecorator  
AtlasRuleDecorator  
Board
Game board class that contains cells of the board.
BoardGUI
Class used to manages GUI board game implementation.
Card
Card class used to store sequence of both standard moves and custom move
CardManager  
CardRuleDecorator  
Cell
Cell class keeps track of levels and workers in Board game.
ChronusRuleDecorator  
ClientCLIMain
Class used to initialize CLI Game.
ClientGUIMain
Class used to initialize GUI Game.
ClientSocketMessage
Cass created to manage ClI and GUI game: It communicates with Server through two Thread in CLI, one active in reading and the other active in writing; while only one in GUI.
ClientSocketMessageCLI
Cass created to manage ClI Game: interacts with ClientCLIMain It inherits from abstract ClientSocketMessage class
ClientSocketMessageGUI
Cass created to manage GUI Game: interacts with BoardGUI It inherits from abstract ClientSocketMessage class
ColorCheck
Class used for setup color
ConnectionManagerSocket
ConnectionManagerSocket manages client connection to Server.
Controller
Controller (Model View Controller Pattern) class that manage game
Deck
Deck class manages card choice.
DemeterRuleDecorator  
FileManager
Class that manages the access to xml files (god power )
Game
Game class is used before that a game starts to initialize Model, Controller and RemoteView class.
gameMessage
in this class there are the various messages used during the game
GameOverMessage
GameOverMessage is a MoveMessage.
HephaestusRuleDecorator  
HestiaRuleDecorator  
MinotaurRuleDecorator  
Model
Model (Model View Controller pattern) class contains all the information about the game, such as board, players and rules
MoveMessage
MoveMessage class is the server's response to the client after it has sent it a PlayerMove.
Observable<T>  
Observer<T>  
PanRuleDecorator  
PickUpCards
Class used to manages GUI card choice implementation.
Player
This class contains all the information about a player: player's Card, player color, two pointer to his Worker and PlayerTurn
PlayerColor
In this class there is the enumeration of possible colors
PlayerMove
PlayerMove class is sent to server by client to show his move.
PlayerMoveEnd
PlayerMoveEnd is a PlayerMove sent to server by client when he wants to end his turn
PlayerTurn
PlayerTurn class is created to store an entire turn of a player until he sends a PlayerMoveEnd.
PoseidonRuleDecorator  
PrometheusRuleDecorator  
RemoteView  
SeleneRuleDecorator  
Server  
ServerMain
ServerMain is used launch Server
SetWorkerPosition
Class used between client and server when each player choose the cell on the board for his workers
showPopUpColor
Class used to manages GUI color choice implementation.
SocketClientConnection  
StandardRuleDecorator
Management of normal play with move-build-end
Step
Step class is used in PlayerTurn class to store every move made by the player so that he can perform the right sequence of moves, standard or custom that depends on his card
Turn
Turn class represents one round of the game from first player to the last one in order of play.
View  
Worker
Workers are game pieces.
